sys_script_include.description: Get a Glide Record of a particular column from the Radar config table
sys_script_include.name: getColumnFromConfig

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_8ea021a407930010fbdbf2508c1ed015
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_459528_radar.getColumnFromConfig</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Get a Glide Record of a particular column from the Radar config table</description><name>getColumnFromConfig</name><script><![CDATA[function getColumnFromConfig(column) {
	// column: string
	
	var radar = new Radar();
	
	// Query the Radar Config table sorted by newest
	var gr = new GlideRecord(radar.configTable.name);
	gr.addNotNullQuery(column + '');
	gr.orderBy('sys_updated_on');
	gr.query();
	
	return gr;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-27 20:44:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>8ea021a407930010fbdbf2508c1ed015</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getColumnFromConfig</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Radar" source="x_459528_radar">d3ac246007130010fbdbf2508c1ed06d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Radar">d3ac246007130010fbdbf2508c1ed06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8ea021a407930010fbdbf2508c1ed015</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-02 21:26:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
